framework.name: SOC 2 Trust Services Criteria
framework.description: Trust Services Criteria focused on security, availability, confidentiality, processing integrity, and privacy.

domains.name: Availability
domains.description: Ensure systems are available as committed.

domains.name: Confidentiality
domains.description: Protect confidential information from unauthorized access.

domains.name: Processing Integrity
domains.description: Ensure system processing is complete, valid, accurate, and timely.

domains.name: Privacy
domains.description: Collect, use, retain, and dispose of personal information appropriately.

controls.title: Security governance and risk oversight
controls.summary_description: Define security objectives, ownership, and oversight to manage risk.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document security governance, risk decisions, and executive reporting cadence.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review security governance
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate governance roles and risk oversight cadence.

controls.title: Identity and access management
controls.summary_description: Grant, modify, and remove access based on role and approval.
controls.implementation_guidance: Enforce MFA, periodic access reviews, and least-privilege access.

suggested_task_templates.title: Perform access review
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate access for privileged accounts and critical apps.

controls.title: Security monitoring and detection
controls.summary_description: Detect and analyze security events to enable timely response.
controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize logs, tune alerts, and document triage procedures.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review monitoring alerts
suggested_task_templates.description: Investigate critical alerts and document outcomes.

controls.title: Availability planning
controls.summary_description: Define availability requirements and monitor capacity.
controls.implementation_guidance: Establish availability targets and monitor capacity thresholds.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review availability targets
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate uptime goals and capacity thresholds.

controls.title: Resilience and recovery
controls.summary_description: Maintain recovery procedures to restore services after disruption.
controls.implementation_guidance: Test backups and recovery steps on a defined cadence.

suggested_task_templates.title: Test recovery procedures
suggested_task_templates.description: Run recovery test and document results.

controls.title: Confidential data classification
controls.summary_description: Classify data and apply handling rules for confidentiality.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define classification levels and enforce handling standards.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review data classification
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm classification coverage for sensitive data.

controls.title: Encryption and key management
controls.summary_description: Protect confidential data with encryption and key management controls.
controls.implementation_guidance: Ensure encryption at rest and in transit with managed key rotation.

controls.title: Change management
controls.summary_description: Control changes to systems that affect processing integrity.
controls.implementation_guidance: Require approvals, testing, and rollback procedures for changes.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review change approvals
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate change approvals and test evidence.

controls.title: Data processing quality
controls.summary_description: Ensure processing outputs are complete, accurate, and timely.
controls.implementation_guidance: Monitor data quality checks and exception handling.

controls.title: Privacy notice and consent
controls.summary_description: Provide clear privacy notices and obtain appropriate consent.
controls.implementation_guidance: Publish privacy notices and track consent collection.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review privacy notice
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate privacy disclosures and consent flows.

controls.title: Data subject rights and retention
controls.summary_description: Honor data subject rights and manage retention/disposal.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document retention schedules and ensure request handling workflows.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review retention schedule
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate retention and disposal controls for personal data.
